verses.verse: And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> was <S%H2204>old,<s%> and well <S%H935>stricken<s%> in <S%H3117>age:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> things.

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H2205>oldest<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%> of his <S%H1004>house,<s%> that <S%H4910>ruled<s%> over <S%H3605>all<s%> that he had, <S%H7760>Put,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> my <S%H3409>thigh:<s%>

And I will make you <S%H7650>swear<s%> by the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> that you shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> to my <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H3427>dwell:<s%>
But you shall <S%H3212>go<s%> to my <S%H776>country,<s%> and to my <S%H4138>kindred,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> to my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac.<s%>

And the <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H194>Peradventure<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> will not be <S%H14>willing<s%> to <S%H3212>follow<s%> <S%H310><s%> me to <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land:<s%> must I <S%H7725>needs<s%> <S%H7725>bring<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> from from <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you <S%H3318>came?<s%>
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H8104>Beware<s%> you that you <S%H7725>bring<s%> not my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H8033>thither<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> me from my <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and from the <S%H776>land<s%> of my <S%H4138>kindred,<s%> and <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to me, and that <S%H7650>swore<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> To your <S%H2233>seed<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land;<s%> he shall <S%H7971>send<s%> his <S%H4397>angel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> to my <S%H1121>son<s%> from <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And if the <S%H802>woman<s%> will not be <S%H14>willing<s%> to <S%H3212>follow<s%> <S%H310><s%> you, then you shall be <S%H5352>clear<s%> from this my <S%H7621>oath:<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> <S%H7725>bring<s%> not my <S%H1121>son<s%> thither <S%H7725>again.<s%>

And the <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3409>thigh<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%> his <S%H113>master,<s%> and <S%H7650>swore<s%> to him <S%H5921>concerning<s%> that <S%H1697>matter.<s%>

And the <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1581>camels<s%> of the <S%H1581>camels<s%> of his <S%H113>master,<s%> and <S%H3212>departed;<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2898>goods<s%> of his <S%H113>master<s%> were in his <S%H3027>hand:<s%> and he <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H763>Mesopotamia,<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H5152>Nahor.<s%>

And he made his <S%H1581>camels<s%> to <S%H1288>kneel<s%> <S%H1288>down<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> by a <S%H875>well<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> at the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H6153>evening,<s%> even the <S%H6256>time<s%> that women <S%H3318>go<s%> out to <S%H7579>draw<s%> water.

And he said <S%H559><s%>O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H7136>send<s%> me good <S%H7136>speed<s%> this <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H6213>show<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H85>Abraham.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I <S%H5324>stand<s%> here by the <S%H5869>well<s%> of <S%H4325>water;<s%> and the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H3318>come<s%> out to <S%H7579>draw<s%> <S%H4325>water:<s%>

And let it <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that the <S%H5291>damsel<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> I shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H5186>Let<s%> <S%H5186>down<s%> your <S%H3537>pitcher,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, that I may <S%H8354>drink;<s%> and she shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H8354>Drink,<s%> and I will give your <S%H1581>camels<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> <S%H1571>also:<s%> let the same be she that you have <S%H3198>appointed<s%> for your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac;<s%> and thereby shall I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you have <S%H6213>showed<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to my <S%H113>master.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, <S%H2962>before<s%> he had <S%H3615>done<s%> <S%H1696>speaking,<s%> that, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out, <S%H834>who<s%> was <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H1328>Bethuel,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4435>Milcah,<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H5152>Nahor,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham's<s%> <S%H251>brother,<s%> with her <S%H3537>pitcher<s%> on her <S%H7926>shoulder.<s%>

And the <S%H5291>damsel<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2896>fair<s%> to <S%H4758>look<s%> on, a <S%H1330>virgin,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> had any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> her: and she <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H5869>well,<s%> and <S%H4390>filled<s%> her <S%H3537>pitcher,<s%> and <S%H5927>came<s%> up.

And the <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H7323>ran<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> her, and <S%H559>said,<s%> Let me, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H1572>drink<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> of your <S%H3537>pitcher.<s%>

And she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8354>Drink,<s%> my <S%H113>lord:<s%> and she <S%H4116>hurried,<s%> and <S%H3381>let<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> her <S%H3537>pitcher<s%> on her <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and gave him <S%H8248>drink.<s%>

And when she had <S%H3615>done<s%> giving him <S%H8248>drink,<s%> she <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H7579>draw<s%> water for your <S%H1581>camels<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H515><s%> they have <S%H3615>done<s%> <S%H8354>drinking.<s%>

And she <S%H4116>hurried,<s%> and <S%H6168>emptied<s%> her <S%H3537>pitcher<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8268>trough,<s%> and <S%H7323>ran<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> to the <S%H875>well<s%> to <S%H7579>draw<s%> water, and <S%H7579>drew<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1581>camels.<s%>

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7583>wondering<s%> at her <S%H2790>held<s%> his <S%H2790>peace,<s%> to <S%H3045>wit<s%> whether the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6743>made<s%> his <S%H1870>journey<s%> <S%H6743>prosperous<s%> or not.

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, as the <S%H1581>camels<s%> had <S%H3615>done<s%> <S%H8354>drinking,<s%> that the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5141>earring<s%> of <S%H1235>half<s%> a <S%H1235>shekel<s%> <S%H4948>weight,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6781>bracelets<s%> for her <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H6235>ten<s%> shekels <S%H4948>weight<s%> of <S%H2091>gold;<s%>

And <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Whose<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> are you? <S%H5046>tell<s%> me, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you: is there <S%H4725>room<s%> in your <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> for us to <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in?
And she <S%H559>said<s%> to him, I am the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4435>Milcah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> she <S%H3205>bore<s%> to <S%H5152>Nahor.<s%>
She <S%H559>said<s%> moreover to him, We have <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> and <S%H4554>provender<s%> <S%H7227>enough,<s%> and <S%H4725>room<s%> to <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in.
And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6915>bowed<s%> <S%H6915>down<s%> his head, and <S%H7812>worshipped<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has not <S%H5800>left<s%> <S%H5800>destitute<s%> my <S%H113>master<s%> of his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and his <S%H571>truth:<s%> I being in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5148>led<s%> me to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H113>master's<s%> <S%H251>brothers.<s%>
And the <S%H5291>damsel<s%> <S%H7323>ran,<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> them of her <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things.<s%>
And <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> had a <S%H251>brother,<s%> and his <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3837>Laban:<s%> and <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H7323>ran<s%> out to the <S%H376>man,<s%> to the <S%H5869>well.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when he <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H5141>earring<s%> and <S%H6781>bracelets<s%> on his <S%H269>sister's<s%> <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and when he <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> his <S%H269>sister,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> to me; that he <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H376>man;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he <S%H5975>stood<s%> by the <S%H1581>camels<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H5869>well.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H935>Come<s%> in, you <S%H1288>blessed<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> you <S%H2351>without?<s%> for I have <S%H6437>prepared<s%> the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H4725>room<s%> for the <S%H1581>camels.<s%>

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H1004>house:<s%> and he <S%H6605>ungirded<s%> his <S%H1581>camels,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> and <S%H4554>provender<s%> for the <S%H1581>camels,<s%> and <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H7364>wash<s%> his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and the <S%H582>men's<s%> <S%H7272>feet<s%> that were with him.

And there was <S%H7760>set<s%> meat <S%H6440>before<s%> him to <S%H398>eat:<s%> but he <S%H559>said,<s%> I will not <S%H398>eat,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H515><s%> I have <S%H1696>told<s%> my <S%H1697>errand.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1696>Speak<s%> on.
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I am <S%H85>Abraham's<s%> <S%H5650>servant.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed<s%> my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H3966>greatly;<s%> and he is <S%H1431>become<s%> <S%H1431>great:<s%> and he has <S%H5414>given<s%> him <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> and <S%H1241>herds,<s%> and <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H5650>menservants,<s%> and <S%H8198>maidservants,<s%> and <S%H1581>camels,<s%> and <S%H2543>asses.<s%>

And <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> my <S%H113>master's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> to my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H310>when<s%> she was <S%H2209>old:<s%> and to him has he <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that he has.

And my <S%H113>master<s%> made me <S%H7650>swear,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> You shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> to my <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> in <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> I <S%H3427>dwell:<s%>
But you shall <S%H3212>go<s%> to my <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and to my <S%H4940>kindred,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> to my <S%H1121>son.<s%>
And I <S%H559>said<s%> to my <S%H113>master,<s%> <S%H194>Peradventure<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> will not <S%H3212>follow<s%> <S%H310><s%> me.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, The <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H1980>walk,<s%> will <S%H7971>send<s%> his <S%H4397>angel<s%> with you, and <S%H6743>prosper<s%> your <S%H1870>way;<s%> and you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> for my <S%H1121>son<s%> of my <S%H4940>kindred,<s%> and of my <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house:<s%>

<S%H227>Then<s%> shall you be <S%H5352>clear<s%> from this my <S%H423>oath,<s%> when you <S%H935>come<s%> to my <S%H4940>kindred;<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> they <S%H5414>give<s%> not you one, you shall be <S%H5355>clear<s%> from my <S%H423>oath.<s%>

And I <S%H935>came<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> to the <S%H5869>well,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> you do <S%H6743>prosper<s%> my <S%H1870>way<s%> which I <S%H1980>go:<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I <S%H5324>stand<s%> by the <S%H5869>well<s%> of <S%H4325>water;<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that when the <S%H5959>virgin<s%> <S%H3318>comes<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H7579>draw<s%> water, and I <S%H559>say<s%> to her, Give me, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> of your <S%H3537>pitcher<s%> to <S%H8248>drink;<s%>

And she <S%H559>say<s%> to me, Both <S%H8354>drink<s%> you, and I will <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H7579>draw<s%> for your <S%H1581>camels:<s%> let the same be the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H3198>appointed<s%> out for my <S%H113>master's<s%> <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And <S%H2962>before<s%> I had <S%H3615>done<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> in my <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> with her <S%H3537>pitcher<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> her <S%H7926>shoulder;<s%> and she <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H5869>well,<s%> and <S%H7579>drew<s%> water: and I <S%H559>said<s%> to her, Let me <S%H8248>drink,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you.

And she made <S%H4116>haste,<s%> and <S%H3381>let<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> her <S%H3537>pitcher<s%> from her shoulder, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8354>Drink,<s%> and I will give your <S%H1581>camels<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> <S%H1571>also:<s%> so I <S%H8354>drank,<s%> and she made the <S%H1581>camels<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H1571>also.<s%>

And I <S%H7592>asked<s%> her, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Whose<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> are you? And she <S%H559>said,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1328>Bethuel,<s%> <S%H5152>Nahor's<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H4435>Milcah<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> to him: and I <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H5141>earring<s%> on her <S%H639>face,<s%> and the <S%H6781>bracelets<s%> on her <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

And I <S%H6915>bowed<s%> <S%H6915>down<s%> my head, and <S%H7812>worshipped<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> had <S%H5148>led<s%> me in the <S%H571>right<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> my <S%H113>master's<s%> <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to his <S%H1121>son.<s%>
